title: Camelids of South America
intro: This is survey about your knowledge or South American camelids. Would you like to tell us what you know?

activities.title: Animal ranges
activities.helpText: Tell us about your about where South American camelids live. There are no right answers; the goal of this activity is to learn about peoples' perceptions of these animals.

questions.question: Where do you think llamas mostly live?
Where do you think alpacas mostly live?
